ModMetaData.name: Animals Forage - Patches
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] A collection of patches to add foraging setting for animals from other mods to the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2381741432]Animals Forage[/url] mod.
Foraging resources and animals supported:
Fish [list] [*]Enhydriodon - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*]Palaeeudyptes - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*]Gomphotaria - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*]Penguin - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Fishercat - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Otter - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Walrus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Spotted Seal - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [/list]
Bamboo from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007061826]VGP Vegetable Garden[/url] [list] [*]Giant Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366589898]VAE - Endangered[/url] [*]Red Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260502331]VAE - Temperate Forest[/url] [*]Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Red Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [/list]
Bugs (Insect meat) [list] [*]Kiwi - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Silkie Chicken- [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Armadillo - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090705625]Erin's Critter Collection[/url] [/list]
Fungus [list] [*]Peccary - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Giant Boars - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2243330771]LotR - Dwarves[/url] [/list]
Berries [list] [*]Black Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2013243795]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Black Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*]Short-Faced Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
